doc.name: CC3000Control
doc.description:
This actor outputs tokens with information to control the CC3000 WiFi Module.

The code generator supplies the method contents, thus this class has no methods.
doc.author: Robert Bui
doc.port: The packetsOut output port. The type is int array.
The sendStatus output port. The type is boolean.
The totalPackets output port. The type is int.
